pr_title: fix(API): Fixes owner auth subscribe with email/phone sign-in

timeline.message: fix(API): Fixes owner auth subscribe with email/phone sign-in

timeline.bodyText: Is this a real token? Could you return RandomString.string() here? Or, could you put this string content into src/test/resources/api/auth-token.txt, and read it in here using the Resources.readAsString(...)?
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams
